explains: v. 前进；超前（advance 的 ing 形式）
wordGroup: advancing front 前沿；波前法；前进前缘

sentences.en: The city was liberated by the advancing army.
sentences.cn: 军队向前挺进，解放了那座城市。

sentences.en: She is still very active, in spite of her advancing years.
sentences.cn: 她尽管年事渐高，仍然十分活跃。

sentences.en: Studying for new qualifications is one way of advancing your career.
sentences.cn: 为提高学历而进修是促进事业发展的一个办法。
